name: The Prophecy of Nayursunda
description:
After a trip, Numy finally goes back to Nahedin, her village but also the place where the Temple of Nayursunda is, a building consecrated to the powerful spirit that controls the flow of time. 

However, when she’s about to arrive, she meets a strange creature that asks her for help…

You will explore the world, venture into new areas, solve mysteries and  problems that will prevent you from advancing and fight your enemies in order to save your village.
